meanings.definition: To select from a group based on desired qualities or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: I will cullay the ripest apples from the tree.
meanings.sent2: She likes to cullay the best flowers for her bouquet.
meanings.sent3: The chef will cullay the finest ingredients for his special dish.
meanings.sent4: He carefully cullays the perfect words for his poem.
meanings.sent5: The farmer must cullay the healthiest chickens for breeding.

meanings.definition: A selection of items or individuals chosen from a larger group.
meanings.sent1: The cullay of books on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent2: He admired the cullay of vintage cars at the show.
meanings.sent3: The cullay of toys in the store made the child excited.
meanings.sent4: She proudly displayed her cullay of seashells from the beach.
meanings.sent5: The cullay of paintings in the gallery was impressive.

meanings.definition: The act of choosing or picking out.
meanings.sent1: Her cullay of a new dress took hours at the store.
meanings.sent2: The cullay of a movie to watch was a tough decision.
meanings.sent3: His cullay of a pet from the shelter brought him joy.
meanings.sent4: The cullay of a dessert from the menu was delicious.
meanings.sent5: Their cullay of a vacation spot was a beautiful beach.
